translations.text: Mulina lya Allah, Jwaukoto wejinji, Jwachanasa channope.
Lumbili losope lwene alapikwe Allah, M'mbuje jwa iwumbe yosope.<sup foot_note=195252>1</sup>
Kwele Jikape tukwagalagatila, soni Kwele Jikape tukwaŵenda chikamuchisyo.

Litala lya aŵala ŵanya ŵamwapele chindimba,<sup foot_note=195254>1</sup> ngaŵaga ŵaŵatumbililidwe (aŵala ŵaŵaimanyi yakuona nikuileka), kapena ŵaŵasokonechele (aŵala ŵaŵailesile yakuona ligongo lya ujinga ni kupotela).
